rune.author: billythegoat101
rune.sacrifices:
Sacrifice - 1x Log at Plant level - 2x Log at Gunpowder level - 1x Coal at Lapis level - 2x Coal at Blaze level
Notes - Requires an hole in the center.
rune.description: Description Digs a pit down into the earth. Requires a hole at the center of the rune (1 block down).
